entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
